titleStmt.title: The Queene of Arragon A tragi-comedie.
titleStmt.author: Habington, William, 1605-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for William Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop at Furnivals Inne gate in Holburne,

notesStmt.note: G4, a cancel, is signed "G4". Variant: G4 is cancellandum, unsigned.
I4 may have been used to print cancel G4.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.

place.placeName: his shop at Furnivals Inne gate in Holburne
